item.title: Formal Notice sent to U.S. Senator Mitt Romney
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-08_2355_0800_formal_notice_senator_mitt_romney.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code ยง 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 08, 2024, 23:55 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Mitt Romney (U.S. Senator) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-08_2355_0800_formal_notice_senator_mitt_romney.pdf Dear Senator Romney, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.S. Code ยง 4. Your attention to its contents is imperative and should not be disregarded.
